metadata.title: CVE-2018-7260 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in db_central_columns.php in phpMyAdmin before 4.7.8 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted URL. It was discovered that phpMyAdmin mishandled certain input. An attacker could use this vulnerability to execute a cross-site scripting (XSS) attack via a crafted URL.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-7260` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.9.2+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.9.2+dfsg1-1').
